com.novell.ldapchai.cr
Interface Challenge

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChaiChallenge
public interface Challenge
extends Serializable

Challenge data object, containing all the properties defined by a challenge.

Instances of Challenge can be generated using ChaiCrFactory.

Challenges are mutable until they are locked. Once locked, setters will throw an illegal state exception.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard

Method Detail

getChallengeText

String getChallengeText()
Get the text of the Challenge question. Depending on the origin and type of the challenge, the value may be null.

Returns:
A string containing the challenge text (question), or null if not available

getMaxLength

int getMaxLength()
Get the maximum length allowed for the response to this Challege.

Returns:
Maximum character length

getMinLength

int getMinLength()
Get the minimum length allowed for the response to this Challege.

Returns:
Minimum character length

isAdminDefined

boolean isAdminDefined()
Get a boolean indicating if the question is defined by the administrator or by the user.

Returns:
true if the question is defined by the administrator, false if defined by the user.

isLocked

boolean isLocked()
Check if the Challege is locked. Once locked, a Challenge is immutable.

Returns:
true if locked.

isRequired

boolean isRequired()
Indicates if this Challenge is one which is required, or if it is one of the random questions.

Returns:
true if the question is required, false if random.

lock

void lock()
Lock this Challenge. Once locked, it is immutable.

setChallengeText

void setChallengeText(String challengeText)
Set the challenge text. Challenge text is only modifiable if the challenge is not locked, and if is not admin defiled (isAdminDefined()).

Parameters:
challengeText - A valid challenge text string.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the challenge is admin defined
IllegalStateException - if the challenge is locked

asChallengeBean

ChallengeBean asChallengeBean()
